adapter
Class Matrix

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--matrix.Matrix
        |
        +--adapter.Matrix
public class Matrix
extends Matrix

This class is an adapter for a matrix manipulation package. The package provides static functions for matrix addition and subtraction. These functions are called "plus" and "minus". A client expects to call these operations "add" and "sub". This adapter solves the problem.
